item.title: This Too Shall Pass: Removing Stale Observations in Dynamic Bayesian Optimization
item.description: W-DBO efficiently tackles stale data in dynamic Bayesian Optimization by leveraging a novel Wasserstein distance-based criterion to remove irrelevant observations, maintaining high sampling frequency …
